revision.comment: /* top */ clean up, replaced: hynix → SK hynix, SK SK hynix → SK hynix
revision.text:
{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = <!-- Image filename --> |image1_size = <!-- Image size, ex.150px --> |caption = VeloCloud EDGE 500-N |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = <!-- product page url only --> |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = VeloCloud |model = EDGE |submodelappend = yes |submodel = 500-N |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = AN900 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = SD-WAN Router, wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = TK4WLE350NX |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = B930F134AB3G800821 |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Intel Atom;C2358; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = x86-64 |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- x86-64 Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 1.75 GHz |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Greenliant;GLS85LS1008B; |flash1size = 8 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash2type = CMOS Serial |fla2_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla2chip = Winbond;W25Q64JVSIQ; |flash2size = 8 |flash2maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR3L |ram1type1 = SO-DIMM |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 4 GiB |ram1chip = SK hynix;; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Marvell;88E1112; |eth3chip = Marvell;88E6176; |sw1chip = Marvell;88E6320; |wan_ports = 3 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = F0:8E:DB |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = Mini PCIe, USB 2.0, SFP (GBIC) |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = 3 |exp_usb_num = 4 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = 1 |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 3.33 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.1 |pwr_barrel_len = 9.5 |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, USB Female Mini-B,, (115200 8N1) |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = SFP, RTC w/ battery, heatsink, fan |addchip = Precision Timer;TI;SE555;;1;,,, 8K I2C Serial EEPROM;Atmel;AT24C64D;;1;,,, LPC I/O Controller;Winbond;W83627DHG;;1;,,, USB to Serial UART Chip;FTDI;FT232R;;1;,,, RS-232 Transceiver;Analog Devices;ADM213;;1;,,, 12-Output PCIe Gen 3 Buffer; Renesas;9ZXL1231;;1;,,, 2K I2C 2-wire Serial EEPROM;Atmel;AT24C02C;;3;,,, 256K SPI Bus Serial EEPROM;Microchip;25LC256;;1;,,, 4A 1MHz Synchronous Buck Regulator;Renesas;ISL8014A;;1;,,, 3A DDR Bus Termination Regulator;Global Mixed-Mode Tech;G2992;;1;,,, 3+1 Voltage Regulator for IMVP-7/VR12 CPUs;Intersil;ISL95831;;1;,,, 18-Port GPIO w/ LED Intensity Control;Maxim Integrated;MAX7314;;1;,,, 8-Pin Flash-Based 8-Bit CMOS Microcontroller;Microchip;PIC12F675;;1;,,, Int. 12A Synchronous Buck Regulator;International Rectifier;IR3840;;1;,,, Int. 9A Single-Input Voltage Synchronous Buck Regulator;Internation Rectifier;IR3899;;2;,,, 30V 25A Single N-Channel Synchronous Power MOSFET;International Rectifier;IRFHM8334;;2;,,, 30V 25A Single N-Channel Synchronous Power MOSFET;International Rectifier;IRFH8325;;2;,,, 30V 50A Single N-Channel Synchronous Power MOSFET;International Rectifier;IRFH8318;;2;,,, 30V 49A N-Channel PowerTrench SyncFET;Fairchild;FDMS7656AS;;2;,,, 30V 42A N-Channel SyncFET;Fairchild Semiconductor;FDMS0312S;;3;,,, 30V 8.8A P-Channel MOSFET;Fairchild Semiconductor;FDS4435;;1;,,, 1A Low Dropout Positive Voltage Regulator;Taitron Components;LD1117A;;1;,,, 2-bit Level-Translating 400kHz I2C/SMBus Buffer/Repeater;TI;TCA9517A;;1;,,, 3A LDO Regulator;Richtek;RT9018A;;4;,,, Octal FET Bus Switch;TI;SN74CBT3245A;;1; |802dot11_protocols = abgn
|defaulip = acquired via DHCP |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = CASwell |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = Compex WLE350NX 7B0000 |rad1modif = Mini PCIe |rad1chip1 = Atheros;AR9590; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 3 |rad1rxchains = 3 |rad1sstreams = 3 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n |rad1n = 450/450 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 2.4 or 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Intel Atom]] C2358 (Dual-core @1.75GHz) *Memory: 4GB (DDR3L) SODIMM *Storage: 8MB CMOS Serial Flash, 8GB GreenLiant Industrial SATA NAND *Network: 6x Gigabit Ethernet ports, 1x Gigabit SFP ports *Wi-Fi: [[Atheros]] AR9590 (802.11abgn) *USB: 4x USB 2.0 ports *PCI: 3x PCIe (1 used by Wi-Fi) *Power: 12V, 3.33A via barrel
==Pictures== <center>'''User Images''' <gallery mode="slideshow"> File:VeloCloud EDGE 500-N Top.jpeg|Board Top File:VeloCloud EDGE 500-N Bottom.jpeg|Board Bottom File:VeloCloud EDGE 500-N Internal.jpeg|Internal View </gallery></center>[[Has images::internal| ]]
